author: Selma Darling
text: Elon pse protect yourself against jealous forces.....we need you!

text: I hope that every person who ever blamed Madelein McCann's own parents for her disappearance to apologise to those 2 heartbroken parents!

text: Elon Musk please don't morph into an asshole like Soros Gates or Schwab...stay as you are!

text: Message to Elon Musk - please buy the whole world!

text: Problem is : some people misunderstand free speech as the right to be abusive!

text: Make up your mind. Stick to it. Don't let ANYONE throw you off!

text: Deliver a proper critique...don't criticise!  Say : you can improve here but this part is nice!
